title: Bootstrap Best Practices
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Writing Maintainable Code

### 1. Don't fight the framework
If you find yourself writing `margin-top: -20px !important`, you are doing it wrong. Use utilities or rethink the structure.

### 2. Semantic HTML
Don't use `<div class="btn">`. Use `<button class="btn">`. Bootstrap classes are visual; HTML tags are semantic.

### 3. Extend, don't Overwrite
Create custom modifier classes (`.btn-custom`) rather than changing `.btn` directly if possible, to keep defaults available.
summary: Follow the grain of the framework for a codebase that scales.
